Who: RODIMUS PRIME, SCOURGE, SCORPONOK, CYCLONUS, DEEPSTRYKE, PHOBIA,
NIGHTRAZOR, LEGACY, JHIAXUS, Tuscon, Nightshift, Darkhawk, Hydras,
Perceptor, Rat Trap, Quickstride
Location: Black Fortress - Hallways/Hole beneath

Rodimus, like the other Autobots fell down into the hole landing on
the grounds in a crash, he had not been expecting quite that sort of
development. He quickly looked around doing a quick check of the room.
"Great." he said as he noted that there was no other exit but the one
above them.

Meanwhile above things were seemingly going well for the Decepticons
and Predacons who appeared to be further away from the hole, that is
until Cyclonus and Deepstryke noticed something.

"Sir?" Cyclonus said to Hydras as he looked at the hole in front of
them and then at the black Autobot tank that had just burst through
the door, "Um, perhaps we should not still be standing here the rest
of the floor is not stable . . .

Deepstryke, rather than firing at those in the hole began firing at
the tank, however his shots could not penetrate the shielding,
although he could clearly see the shield beginning to weaken under
their sustained fire. Phobia followed suit.

Rodimus from below watched as Tuscon and Nightshift attempted to use
some sort of ninjabot training. He shook his head, wishing he had paid
more attention to those classes. However he did remember one thing as
he looked upwards, 'always be prepared.'

Rodimus' hand retracted and in its place was a grappling hook which he
fired upwards, and with a click it latched onto something above. As
fast as he could he began to climb out of the hole, while still
dodging the firepower that was coming from above!

Rodimus swung around as he felt a blast of heat as several shots came
close to hitting him, one causing him to spin as his shoulder was
clipped! "We are clay pigeons down here!" Rodimus grunted as he
continued to climb.

Legacy oriented his main cannon at the Predacons and Decepticons, his
intention was not to hit them, but to destroy the floor beneath their
feet, and send them tumbling down into the hole as well! The front of
the tank glowed as energy was built up, and then a beam of light and
destructive energy was fired from the great cannon muzzle vaporizing
the floor!

Legacy's voice intoned over the radio, "Then I would suggest vacating
this location as soon as possible."

(TAG)

Preston
